<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="freeze_time">freeze_time</variable><variable type="Number" id="radius">radius</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="-42" y="-36"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><comment pinned="false" h="100" w="443">IMMEDIATE SOURCE ENTITY - The projectile
EVENT/TARGET ENTITY - The mob that was directly hit
SOURCE ENTITY - The shooter
ENTITY ITERATOR - Entity in radius</comment><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="64" w="292">if the staff has ensorcellation, freeze mobs in a radius around the projectile</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">radius</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block
